file_content.text: [Gaden Ko approaches, now that you have made the path safe]
Light in darkness.
Grandfather? You died. The cave and the beast, before my rescue.
I apologize, sir, for not being able to save you.
I wish I had arrived sooner.
Whoever it looks like, this isn't really your grandfather.
Gaden-Ko, he isn't real.
My memories are real.
I'd better let the two of you talk things over.
Well, this is awkward.
Talons in my flesh, Gaden-Ko. My breath fading. My last thought, failure.
Grandfather, stop!
Hope remains. We sprang from this Deep Cradle. The altars root us. Life, death, duty.
Here, all is possible. Ask, and life returns. Your parents, sister, cousins. Myself--returned. Shall it be?
These lands are corrupted; this apparition could be lying.
A temptation. Be cautious.
Trust your feelings and do what you believe is right.
I cannot help you decide.
Becoming a Mystic is no substitute for the lives you threw away.
Say yes. Restore your family.
I... my family... No. I must accept. Learn from what is necessary. I cannot be selfish.
You shoulder a Mystic's burden. Willingly. Training ends, Gaden-Ko.
Grandfather, your death. I do not understand.
It will take your life to understand.
Jedi. Your protection made this possible.
I feel there is much I could learn from you.
Can you teach me, too?
I offer truth. One question, to guide you. Ask.
Thanks aren't necessary.
I think there's more to you than a familiar face.
What are you, really?
A voice. Knowledge. And, at heart, Dajan-Ko.
A reward is due. You walk a difficult path. If you seek truth, ask.
Can you tell me who the First Son is?
Who is the First Son?
The First Son stands always behind you. He begins. Does not end.
Hey, is it too late to ask for another couple of questions?
Oh good. Mystery solved.
Tell me how the Republic can be victorious against the Empire.
How can we win the war?
The Republic falls. Unless a friend sacrifices all for you.
No easy answers.
I've heard better "truths" shouted across a pazaak den at three in the morning.
I was kind of hoping for a battle plan.
Don't look at me.
Wait, you can't just leave it at that!
A small token, hidden. To ease suffering. It is yours.
There must be an object of great power somewhere on this planet. Where?
I seek powerful artifacts.
An ancient weapon, hidden. Its origins, hidden. It is yours.
Our divide is known. My grandchild, reborn. Many thanks. Gaden-Ko, farewell.
Darkness lingers. Healing must begin, Jedi. Seek the divide. Gaden-Ko, farewell.
Grandfather. I will... Jedi, wait. I see.
The world is different. Beautiful. A vision. I... am a Mystic.
Your vision, what was it?
Tell me what you saw.
Two suns. One alight. The other dead. A mountain to the stars. The Three must know.
Congratulations. No doubt your people will be eager to welcome you home.
We should return to Voss-Ka.
Home. The Three must know.
That looked more like a migraine to me.
You're sure that was a vision?
I saw. I am a Mystic. The Three must know.
A moment alone here, please? Call when all is ready.
Then, to Voss-Ka.
